oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Light Crust Doughboys - 1950-11-10 - 5698
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Light Crust Doughboys radio transcription originally broadcast 1950-11-10, program number 5698. Featuring vocalist Leon Payne, announcer 'Jack Perry' (likely played by Walter Hailey), and director of the Light Crust Kitchen Ruth Perry.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Light Crust Doughboys; Leon Payne
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Easy Ridin' Papa) -- Opening statement (Jack Perry) -- Jack Perry introduces Ruth Perry -- Ruth Perry talks about her recipe -- Jack Perry introduces the first song -- You've Still Got A Place In My Heart (Leon Payne) -- Light Crust Flour commercial (Jack Perry) -- Girl Of My Dreams (Leon Payne) -- Jack Perry and Ruth Perry read the prize-winning recipe -- Whispering Hope -- Light Crust Flour commercial (Jack Perry) -- Enclosed, One Broken Heart (Leon Payne) -- Closing statement (Jack Perry) -- Theme (Easy Ridin' Papa)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Light Crust Doughboys; Payne, Leon
